title: Subleases and assignments
context: [ยง521-37] Subleases and assignments. (a) Unless otherwise agreed to in a written rental agreement and except as otherwise provided in this section, the tenant may sublet the tenant&rsquo;s dwelling unit or assign the rental agreement to another without the landlord&rsquo;s consent. (b) Subsection (a) does not apply to a tenant of a dwelling unit administered, owned, or subsidized by the United States, the State, a county, or any agency thereof. &copy; A written rental agreement may provide that the tenant&rsquo;s right to sublet the tenant&rsquo;s dwelling unit or assign the rental agreement is subject to the consent of the landlord. [L 1972, c 132, pt of ยง1; gen ch 1985]
